feature.label: Coloane Core
feature.description: Coloane is a tool designed to model complex systems using various formalisms. More then a simple editor, Coloane gives you the ability to use the FrameKit platform. Thanks to a simple UI, you can invoke a large collection of tools on your model without any efforts.
